caption:
This photograph captures a young boy joyfully playing at the beach. He is seated on a bright yellow, inflatable boogie board that is floating in shallow, clear blue water. The boy, who appears to be around four or five years old, is celebrating a moment of delight, his arms energetically raised above his head and his mouth open as if he is cheering or laughing. He has blond hair and is wearing only a pair of brown and red swim trunks.

The environment around him is a typical beach setting under bright, sunny weather, enhancing the vivid colors in the scene. The water is calm with gentle ripples, and the background hints at a sandy beach that extends beyond the frame. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of carefree summer fun, evoking a sense of warmth and joy.
title: Lake Powell
